title: Beam Center
shortDescription: Bold and beautiful. This is a perfect example of the scalability of svg.
instructions:
The great thing about SVG is that this graphic will scale infinitely. This graphic would be huge if it were a bitmap.

Maybe eventually I will make a version with full control over both colors, but the filesize would have to be much larger.

Aug. 1: Added parameters for x and y axis, so it doesn't have to only be "Beam Center" anymore.
